title: Matcha Latte & Snack Order
setting: Morning rush at EchoLag Café with a returning guest.

script.line: Good morning! Welcome back to EchoLag Café. What can I start for you today?
Hi! Can I get an iced matcha latte with oat milk?
Absolutely. Just to confirm: one iced matcha latte made with oat milk. Would you like it sweetened or unsweetened?
Got it—lightly sweetened. What size works for you today?
Perfect, that's a medium iced matcha latte with oat milk, lightly sweetened.
Would you like to add anything to eat this morning? We just pulled a fresh tray of matcha shortbread and blueberry chia bites.
Oh, those sound good. I'll take an order of the blueberry chia bites.
Great choice! One blueberry chia bites—would you like those warmed up?
No thanks, room temperature is fine.
So that's a medium iced matcha latte with oat milk, lightly sweetened, and one order of blueberry chia bites at room temperature. Anything else for you?
Awesome. Your total today is $8.45. You can tap whenever you're ready.
We'll have your drink and snack ready at the end of the counter. Thanks for stopping by, and enjoy your matcha!

coachingNotes: Keep tone upbeat and confident; mirror the guest's order back clearly.
Follow the checklist: drink, size, milk, name.
Offer reheating or plating options for snacks when appropriate.
